definition: Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])
can be understood, but not described (idiom, from Zhuangzi 莊子|庄子); mysterious and subtle
pinyin: zhi3 ke3 yi4 hui4 , bu4 ke3 yan2 chuan2

definition: can be understood, but not described (idiom, from Zhuangzi 莊子|庄子); mysterious and subtle
pinyin: ke3 yi3 yi4 hui4 , bu4 ke3 yan2 chuan2

sentences.english: It is rather to be thought of than expressed what was now my condition.
sentences.chinese: 我现在的情形是只可意会，不可言传的。

sentences.english: The most profound joy, no person may make sense.
sentences.chinese: 最深刻的快乐，没有可能使得他人意会。

sentences.english: This letter is so badly written that I can't figure out what the writer is trying to say.
sentences.chinese: 这封信写得太坏了，我意会不出写信的人想说些什么。

sentences.english: The language of friendship is not words but meanings.
sentences.chinese: 友谊的表达方式是只可意会，不可言传的。

sentences.english: It reminds me of the film The Lion King.
sentences.chinese: 让人想到了《狮子王》，只可意会啊，呵呵。

definition: can be understood, but not described (idiom, from Zhuangzi 莊子|庄子); mysterious and subtle
pinyin: zhi3 ke3 yi4 hui4 , bu4 ke3 yan2 chuan2

definition: (conventional letter ending) words cannot fully express what is in my heart (idiom)
to know from experience/to learn through experience/to realize/understanding/experience
to fathom/to make sense of/to grasp
body odor/to appreciate a subtle taste
to express or convey one's ideas
to contain/to hold/(of a person or style etc) reserved/restrained/(of words, writings) full of hidden meaning/implicit/veiled (criticism)
